gold: The table shows the per capita consumption of chewing gum in selected countries worldwide from 2009 to 2012.

In 2010 , the United States ' index value of per capita consumption of chewing gum amounted to 152.Chewing gum marketChewing gum belongs to the snack and confectionery segment and is the smallest category besides chocolate and sugary products.
Chewing gum has a chewy , easily formable texture and usually has – besides some exceptions – a sweet taste .
